page.title: 19VOLUNTARY WORK
page.content: There is much voluntary work being done in the area.{Meals on Wheels} supply lunches to the elderly, people using their own cars to deliver them. {The Lions}raise money, locally for TV and shower units for sheltered housing schemes, Christmas parcels for the needy and internationally for Eye camps in Asie and Kenyan irrigation scheme.In May a concert was held in{Pangbourne College}when members of the{London Symphony Orchestra}raised money for Ethiopia.{The Pangbourne and {district volunteer centre}have offices at the United Reformed Church and offer help in a variety of ways, e.g. transport to surgery or hospital. The area is one of the major contributors to{The Royal Naval Lifeboat Institute. There is also an {OXFAM}shop in Pangbourne. {
